content.rendered:
• Proven UI Experience
  • Demonstrable UI design skills with a strong portfolio
  • Must have worked in an IT/Software/Technology company and familiar with tech-jargons
  • Solid experience in creating wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site
    maps
  • Proficiency in Photoshop, Illustrator, OmniGraffle, or other visual design and wire-framing
    tools
  • Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for rapid prototyping.
  • Excellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user-system interaction
  • Up-to-date with the latest UI trends, techniques, and technologies
  • Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process
  • Excellent attention to detail and the ability to prioritize and work on multiple projects in a
    fast-paced, changing environment.
